message:
Hi Stephen,
Thanks for this blog and other insighful articles on Async and await.

Currently facing one Sync over Async situation for which i have posted the same question in Stack overflow. See
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/61970718/using-async-graph-api-in-sync-methods

Could you please look at that and suggest me the best approach to use when we do not have a choice on Sync over Async and Async over Sync.

Thanks in advance

Dinesh
